core:process.core:comment: DCC Availability Check and Rate Lookup using Fexco Dynamic Host Service. Returns the card data response object for use as the rate lookup.

core:action.core:comment: Invokes a web service with given message entity and the service URL.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Valid response but DCC not available for this card

core:param.value: Response from Fexco DHS has Error Response Code {fexcoDCCGetCardRateResult.getCardRateResponse.responseCode}: {errorText}, TransactionId={transactionHandler.transaction.transactionId}, {fexcoDCCGetCardRateResult.getCardRateResponse}
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:param.value: Response from Fexco DHS has invalid reference TransactionId={transactionHandler.transaction.transactionId} {fexcoDCCGetCardRateResult.getCardRateResponse}.
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: errorCode == 1 ? 'Unknown Error' : errorCode == 2 ? 'Invalid Message Format' : errorCode == 4 ? 'Unknown Acquirer or Merchant' : errorCode == 8 ? 'Unsupported Card Type' : errorCode == 9 ? 'Card ID and Foreign Currency are both invalid' : errorCode == 10 ? 'Invalid Base Amount' : errorCode == 11 ? 'Invalid Reference Number' : errorCode == 12 ? 'Invalid Merchant ID' : errorCode == 13 ? 'Invalid Acquirer ID' : errorCode == 14 ? 'Invalid Foreign Currency Code' : errorCode == 15 ? 'Invalid Card ID' : errorCode == 16 ? 'Invalid Base Currency' : 'Unexpected Error'
